item.title: HDU 1237 - 简单计算器 表达式求值
item.description: 读入一个只包含 +, -, *, / 的非负整数计算表达式，计算该表达式的值。 Input 测试输入包含若干测试用例，每个测试用例占一行，每行不超过200个字符，整数和

item.title: HDU 1387 - Team Queue
item.description: Queues and Priority Queues are data structures which are known to most computer scientists. The Team Queue, however, is not so well known, though it occurs often in everyday life. At lunch time the queue in front of the Mensa is a team queue, for example. In a team queue each element belongs to a team. If an element enters the queue, it first searches the queue from head to

item.title: HDU 1509 - Windows Message Queue
item.description: Message queue is the basic fundamental of windows system. For each process, the system maintains a message queue. If something happens to this process, such as mouse click, text change, the system will add a message to the queue. Meanwhile, the process will do a loop for getting message from the queue according to the priority value if it is not empty. Note that the less priority value means the

item.title: HDU 1702 - ACboy needs your help again!
item.description: ACboy was kidnapped!! he miss his mother very much and is very scare now.You can’t image how dark the room he was put into is, so poor :(. item.title: HDU 1873 - 看病要排队
item.description: 看病要排队这个是地球人都知道的常识。 不过经过细心的0068的观察，他发现了医院里排队还是有讲究的。0068所去的医院有三个医生（汗，这么少）

item.title: 简单数据结构(队列 栈 树 堆 )
item.description: 基础知识 基本概念 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 程序 = 算法 + 数据结构 数据结构是计算机存储、组织数据的方式。 数据结构是指相互之间存在一种或多种特定关系的数据
